resources.string: This sample demonstrates how to record video using Camera2 API.
Token retrieved and sent to server! You can now record.
An error occurred while either fetching the InstanceID token, sending the fetched token to the server or subscribing to the PubSub topic. Please try running the sample again.
How many seconds should record for?
How many minutes should wait between recording?
This sample needs permission for camera, audio recording, and file writing.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
